title: Sepver Frame Glasses Metal Aviator Polarized Sunglasses for Men Women UV 400

It blocks 99-100% of both UVA and UVB harmful radiation 2. It has a special polarized filter to block over 99.96% of glare 3. Classic unisex design (So you can protect your eyes while looking stylish) 4.
